mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.major_id AS "majorId", a.course_id AS "course.id", b.lesson_cnt AS "course.lessoncnt", b.livecourse_cnt AS "course.livecourseCnt", b.homework_cnt AS "course.homeworkCnt", b.lessontime AS "course.lessontime", a.position AS "position", a.conditions AS "conditions", a.isreward AS "isreward", a.quiz_id AS "quizId", a.passcnt AS "passcnt", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.topspeed_days AS "topspeedDays", a.topspeed_scholarship AS "topspeedScholarship", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
left join course b on b.id=a.course_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO locks( id, name, major_id, course_id, position, conditions, isreward, quiz_id, passcnt, startdate, topspeed_days, topspeed_scholarship, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{majorId}, #{course.id}, #{position}, #{conditions}, #{isreward}, #{quizId}, #{passcnt}, #{startdate}, #{topspeedDays}, #{topspeedScholarship}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE locks SET name = #{name}, major_id = #{majorId}, course_id = #{course.id}, position = #{position}, conditions = #{conditions}, isreward = #{isreward}, quiz_id = #{quizId}, passcnt = #{passcnt}, startdate = #{startdate}, topspeed_days = #{topspeedDays}, topspeed_scholarship = #{topspeedScholarship}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
